name: Grier Cooper
seeking: Grier Cooper's Panic-Free Formula seeks JV partners in the mental health, anxiety coaching, or personal development space who work with clients experiencing panic or anxiety. She would benefit from referral relationships with therapists, psychiatrists, or mindfulness coaches who encounter clients wanting non-clinical coping tools. Co-promotional arrangements with stress management or burnout recovery programs would reach her target audience.
who_you_serve: People who struggle with panic attacks and anxiety disorders and want a structured, formula-driven approach to regain mental calm and daily function.
what_you_do: Provides panic-free formula programs for anxiety management and mental wellness.
offering: Panic and anxiety relief coaching programs through the Panic-Free Formula
business_focus: Provides panic-free formula programs for anxiety management and mental wellness.
